title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.2 - Mains or conduits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.2 - Mains or conduits

State Regulations

Each application for a permit for the installation of a
main or conduit along a State highway for a distance of more than 200 feet
shall be personally reviewed by the regional director or assistant regional
director and, if approved, the permit shall bear the reviewer's
signature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
128.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
